en.title: Hotel Sherpa Soul – Thamel, Kathmandu
en.description: We are located in Thamel, the bustling heart of Kathmandu — just steps away from cultural landmarks, restaurants, shops, and local experiences.

aboutStory.paragraph1: Nestled in the heart of Thamel, Kathmandu, Hotel Sherpa Soul offers a unique blend of cultural charm, comfort, and convenience for both national and international travelers exploring the wonders of Nepal.
aboutStory.paragraph2: Whether you're a local guest discovering your own country's treasures or an international visitor exploring Nepal's majestic landscapes and historic sites, our hotel serves as the perfect base with warm hospitality and modern amenities.
aboutStory.paragraph3: At Hotel Sherpa Soul, we proudly welcome guests from across Nepal and around the world, sharing the authentic essence of Sherpa warmth in the capital's most vibrant neighborhood.

homeTestimonial.text: The airport pickup service made our arrival so easy. From the first moment, the Sherpa Soul team made us feel welcome and cared for.
homeTestimonial.name: Emily Dawson
homeTestimonial.title: United Kingdom

homeTestimonial.text: The 24/7 front desk was always available to guide us, even when we planned a late-night trip. Their tour assistance made exploring Kathmandu stress-free.
homeTestimonial.name: Takeshi Mori
homeTestimonial.title: Japan

homeTestimonial.text: Our room was spotless with hot showers after long days of trekking. The staff even helped with laundry, which was a lifesaver.
homeTestimonial.name: Sarah Jennings
homeTestimonial.title: Germany

homeTestimonial.text: Staying here felt like being part of a family. The staff arranged local tours and always went above and beyond with their hospitality.
homeTestimonial.name: Carlos Rivera
homeTestimonial.title: Spain

homeTestimonial.text: Waking up to Himalayan views and sipping butter tea on the balcony was unforgettable. The comfort of modern amenities blended beautifully with Sherpa traditions.
homeTestimonial.name: Lina Mehta
homeTestimonial.title: Nepal

homeTestimonial.text: From warm check-in greetings to check-out blessings, every detail was thoughtful. The hot showers and clean rooms made our stay so comfortable.
homeTestimonial.name: Thomas Lee
homeTestimonial.title: China

homeTestimonial.text: They even prepared special meals for my dietary needs. The combination of organic Nepali food and excellent service made it a memorable stay.
homeTestimonial.name: Juliette Morin
homeTestimonial.title: France

homeTestimonial.text: The design of the inn reflects Sherpa heritage while offering modern comfort. I especially appreciated the sustainable approach and friendly service.
homeTestimonial.name: George Franklin
homeTestimonial.title: Italy

homeTestimonial.text: Their local travel guidance was incredible. With the front desk's help, we discovered hidden temples and villages I’d never have found on my own.
homeTestimonial.name: Anna Schmidt
homeTestimonial.title: Austria

homeTestimonial.text: After trekking, the hot shower and relaxing massage at the inn’s wellness service were pure bliss. I felt completely rejuvenated.
homeTestimonial.name: Maria Gonzalez
homeTestimonial.title: United Arab Emirates

homeTestimonial.text: As a solo female traveler, I felt safe and cared for. The staff treated me like family and always ensured I was comfortable.
homeTestimonial.name: Priya Sharma
homeTestimonial.title: India

homeTestimonial.text: I admire how Sherpa Soul supports the local community while providing modern services like Wi-Fi, laundry, and tours. Truly responsible and comfortable travel.
homeTestimonial.name: David Chen
homeTestimonial.title: Singapore

aboutstats.para1: Experience authentic Sherpa hospitality in our cozy guest house. We believe that comfortable accommodation shouldn't break the bank. Our family-run establishment offers warm, personalized service with all the essential amenities you need for a memorable stay.
aboutstats.para2: Whether you're here for business, leisure, or passing through on your journey, we provide a clean, safe, and welcoming environment where every guest is treated like family. Our commitment to affordable luxury means you get exceptional value without compromising on quality or comfort.
